item.title: Third Coast Java Library
item.description: Our Third Coast swerve drive, talon configuration and telemetry API for FRC robots is available from its repository. Documentation Third Coast Javadocs.

item.title: Thirdcoast Talon
item.description: Talon Configurations Third Coast provides a library for storing any number of Talon configurations in a TOML file and applying them to Talons. The configuration file is stored in the robot application JAR and loaded by the class loader. The structure of a Talon configuration file is: # first Talon configuration [[TALON]] name = "drive" mode = "Voltage" # etc... # second Talon configuration [[TALON]] name = "azimuth" mode = "Position" # etc.
